code: import React from'react';import'./Portfolio.css';import{motion}from'framer-motion';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Portfolio=function Portfolio(props){var fadeLeft={hidden:{opacity:0,x:-100},visable:{opacity:1,x:0}};var fadeUp={hidden:{opacity:0,y:+100},visable:{opacity:1,y:0}};var fadeRight={hidden:{opacity:0,x:+100},visable:{opacity:1,x:0}};var fadeDown={hidden:{opacity:0,y:-100},visable:{opacity:1,y:0}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"portfolio",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"special-heading",children:"Portfolio"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"If you do it right, it will last forever "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"portfolio-content",children:props.info.map(function(item){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(motion.div,{variants:fadeUp,initial:"hidden",animate:"visable",transition:{duration:1},className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.img,{src:item.image,variants:fadeLeft,initial:"hidden",animate:"visable",transition:{duration:2}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(motion.div,{className:"text-info",variants:fadeRight,initial:"hidden",animate:"visable",transition:{duration:2},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:item.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:item.text})]})]},item.id);})})]})});};export default Portfolio;
